title: Anika Noni Rose Gets 'Hype' To 'Radioactive'
teaser: Anika Noni Rose was nominated for a Tony Award this year for her performance in A Rasin in the Sun. For Tell Me More's series 'In Your Ear' she shares the music that helps keep her fit and focused.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
